official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to exclude a facility with less than 30 beds from treatment as an institution for mental diseases under the medicaid program.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) to exclude facilities with less than 30 beds from treatment as institutions for mental diseases under Medicaid.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to exclude a facility with less than 30 beds from treatment as an institution for mental diseases under the medicaid program.
